summary:
A tool to help modders find out which Papyrus Script functions are fast and which are slow.

Not for normal game play!
descriptionHtml:
This is a pair of scripts and a little ESP to run them intended just for modders who want to test how long it takes for different functions and operations to work in Skyrim.

Performance of the commands varies widely. For example, the Game.GetPlayer() function takes approximately 1000 times longer to run than just accessing a property set to PlayerRef.

The ESP included is NOT for normal game play! Read the README file for a full explanation.

If you do run this script, share your results by posting in the discussion thread so we can find out how much the speed of functions varies for different systems.

There's a [url=http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1383987-performance-characteristics-of-papyrus-functions-and-operations/page__pid__20986385]thread on the Bethesda formums[/url] for discussing and sharing results or you can just post a comment here.
author: CDCooley
